attributes.action: immediatly instruct office of fair trading to conduct in-depth enquiry into recent uk gas and electric price rises.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although the recent past has seen large increases in the wholesale cost of prices for the large energy companies. These increase have been far outstripped by the prices which have been passed on to consumers. It is indefencible that whilst these companies are making vast profits they are using the excuse of price rises to further increase their profit base.
